CustomField.description:
System-managed field, marks the first contact added in an account.
Used in Marketo for Account Segmentation - only one Contact needs to be contacted for an Account, but standard Marketo will pull all of the Account's Contacts (which is not ideal, repetition)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System-managed field, marks the first contact added in an account.
CustomField.label: First Contact in Account
